posts.post_content: [Urborg Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urborg Drake) is in the same set. It's the same size and is about as likely to be blocked by a green deck as the serpent here, but for one mana less. It's not bad but it's not that great, either, so... yeah, this fella leaves a fair bit to be desired. Blue and black were a very powerful combination in Invasion, so I wish they had some better gold creatures.
